help.cmd_define_directory: Defines a directory for the logs to be create, saved in
help.cmd_add.file: Adds a file with the specified path and with the Friendly Name (Friendly Name is optional)
help.cmd_add.friendly_name: Assign a friendly name to a file after the file is added with the add file command
help.cmd_remove.friendly_name: Remove a friendly name from being associated with a File Path

cmd_bind.params: Filter Name,Friendly Name or File Path

help.cmd_bind: Bind a filter to a friendly name, if a condition is hit, then the text will not be logged. The conditions types will be checked with or relation
help.cmd_unbind: Unbind a filter from a friendly name
help.cmd_bind_list: List the bound filters to friendly names
help.cmd_remove.file: Remove a file from the dumping list
help.cmd_list: List the files added to dumping list

p_Directory.values: Any valid directory path (can be relative)

help.p_Directory: Defines a valid path to a logging directory

p_File.values: Any valid file path (can be relative) whit extension

help.p_File: defines a valid path to a file
help.p_Friendly.Name: Defines a valid Friendly Name for File path association

p_Friendly.Name.or.File.Path.values: An existing friendly name,a valid added file's path

help.p_Friendly.Name.or.File.Path: Defines an index to an array of added files based on friendly name or file path
help.p_Filter.Name: Defines a valid, existing filter name
